name: Sweets Dreams
description:
You fell asleep in your sleeping bag and now you are sliding down the mountain. Dodge obstacles and survive!.

Controls

  • W, S or UP, DOWN arrows to move.
  • Press Space Bar to jump.

Authors

Game Design:

  • Samuel Andrés Agudelo (HAMSOFT23)

The entire team has helped to define the initial concept of the game and have come up with wonderful ideas.
